Articles.Content:
Finally! Sorry it is 43 minutes long.

<iframe allowfullscreen="" frameborder="0" height="113" width="200" data-embed-src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/Of9kHpCv1ts?feature=oembed"></iframe>

Felicia Day Hill

(cuz I remember her from *The Guild* series)

**Edited <time datetime="2021-11-18T20:42:49Z" title="11/18/2021 08:42  PM" data-short="2 yr">November 18, 2021</time> by kerbiloid**

Codex Hill.

So do I.
I stole your hill

That was the inflatable decoy.

Anchored Hill.

The hill anchoring became a common practice and got a special term.

Anchorage Hill.
Somewhere to weather the storm Hill.
Vancouver Hill
Vancouver Hill Island

Cover it in water.

MY ISLAND

Get some sand.

My Beach Island.

Dolly and Kenny

Islands in the Stream

The stream slips.

Slipstream Hill

Spoiler

![MV5BYWFjZDM5NjAtMDdkYy00YjQxLWIzNmMtNjE2](https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWFjZDM5NjAtMDdkYy00YjQxLWIzNmMtNjE2Y2NhYTM3OWMyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzI4MDMyMTU@._V1_.jpg)![p11455_v_h9_ab.jpg](https://resizing.flixster.com/dIvx6uNXOhH5fmg7THRWHvd1tDY=/300x300/v2/https://flxt.tmsimg.com/assets/p11455_v_h9_ab.jpg)![slipstream895.jpg](https://misantropey.files.wordpress.com/2015/03/slipstream895.jpg)

I have that on DVD.

Little known Hill.
I a classic Soviet Union tactic , I charged your hill, tacking the hill after 3 hours of brutal warfare

ok so 

I build a giant hill, build a nuclear launch facility, and destroy everyone else's hills.

After the fallout settles, I build a glorious nation built on the concept of propaganda and rockets

A lone vault dweller dismantles your nation.

The Fallout Hill.

Any hill in Fallout is a property of Vault-Tec.

Vault Hill

Vault got pommeled.

Pommel Horse Hill.

Herr Pommel renames it in more familiar manner.

Pommelpferdhügel

"Errrr, I ain't touching that, your free to go, exit is third down on the left"

Slamacow's "Minecraft Witch Dance Battle Hill.

My hill too.

I’m just gonna create a new hill

Hill hill

William Hill claims his rights on it.

Hill William Hill
